code: import{fillRect}from"gdxjs";var createStunScreenRenderSystem=function createStunScreenRenderSystem(){return{update:function update(delta,_ref,_ref2){var stunScreen=_ref.stunScreen;var width=_ref2.width,height=_ref2.height,batch=_ref2.batch,camera=_ref2.camera,whiteTex=_ref2.whiteTex;if(stunScreen.check){batch.setProjection(camera.combined);batch.begin();batch.setColor(1,0,0,stunScreen.opacity);fillRect(batch,whiteTex,0,0,width,height);batch.end();stunScreen.opacity-=delta*4;if(stunScreen.opacity<=0){stunScreen.opacity=1;stunScreen.check=false;}}}};};export default createStunScreenRenderSystem;
